arts.ttl: West Ham v Tottenham – Frank delivers good news for Hammers’ hopes
arts.sum: There is the danger of the discontent off the pitch becoming an all consuming distraction from the football on it. West Ham take on Tottenham tomorrow in a London derby which used to be hotly contested but whilst recent events have been tepid, the Mohammed Kudus; transfer and his comments thereafter have the capacity to […] Source

arts.ttl: Simons? Muani? Solanke? Frank reveals latest Spurs team news before West Ham
arts.sum: Tottenham Hotspur manager Thomas Frank confirms the availability of Xavi Simons, Randal Kolo Muani and Dominic Solanke for Saturday's Premier League London derby with West Ham United.

arts.ttl: West Ham Explain Why They've Banned Half-and-Half Scarves For Tottenham Match
arts.sum: West Ham United have banned half-and-half scarves from their Premier League game with Tottenham on Saturday.

arts.ttl: West Ham vs Tottenham: Premier League Preview, Prediction & Lineups
arts.sum: Tottenham visit the London Stadium for a bitter London derby on Saturday evening.

arts.ttl: How to stream West Ham vs Tottenham, the Plausible XI and of course, our prediction!
arts.sum: West Ham is currently sitting 16th in the table, and Tottenham is in 4th after three matches. Key storylines for fans will undoubtedly include Tottenham's new signing, Mohammed Kudus, facing his former club, West Ham, and both teams dealing with injuries (e.g., West Ham without Niclas Füllkrug due to a calf issue; Tottenham monitoring Dominic Solanke's fitness). The post How to stream West Ham vs Tottenham, the Plausible XI and of course, our prediction! appeared first on The Boy Hotspur.

arts.ttl: West Ham ban half-and-half scarves for Spurs tie
arts.sum: West Ham have banned supporters from taking half-and-half scarves into the London Stadium for the team's Premier League clash with Tottenham on Saturday.
